/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/VertexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/IndexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Geometry.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/ShaderMaterial.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Attrib.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Uniform.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/TriMesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Common.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/stb_image.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Object3D.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/UniformValue.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SGLRender.dir/Scene.cpp.o  -o SGLRender -lGLEW -lGL -lglut
